pddl4j.exp.action
Class Action

java.lang.Object
  pddl4j.exp.action.AbstractActionDef
      pddl4j.exp.action.Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Term>, ActionDef
public class Action
extends AbstractActionDef

This class implements a strips action of the pddl language.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

Action

public Action(java.lang.String name)
Creates a new strips action with a specific image. By default the precondition is set to an empty conjunctive precondition goal description and the effect to an empty proposition effect.

Parameters:
name - - the name of the action. The image musts be a not reference to a string.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if name == null.

standardize

public Action standardize()
Standardizes all occurrences of the variables that occur in this expression. Remember that free variables are existentially quantified.

Returns:
a standardized copy of this expression.

normalize

public Action normalize()
Normalize this action. This method returns a copy of this action where:
  • each variable is standardized,
  • precondition expression is convert into disjunctive prenex normal form and
  • effect expression is is convert into conjunctive prenex normal form.

      • Returns:
      a normalize copy of this action.
      See Also:
      Exp.toPrenexNormaForm(), Exp.toConjunctiveNormalForm(), Exp.toDisjunctiveNormalForm()
